author: Leo Marsicanus, Cardinal Bishop of Ostia, ca. 1045?-1115?
title: Chronicon antiquum sacri monasterij Cassinensis, olim a Leone cardinali, & episcopo Ostiensi conscriptum: nunc vero a reuerendo patre d. Matthaeo Laureto ... recognitum, & pristinae integritati restitutum, ac pluribus adnotationibus illustratum, & auctum.
